metadata.name: The First Avril15's Snow
metadata.description:
And at this time, in this place, time seems to have stopped.
2177 year. Earth

Katy Koka 2022

Natural phenomena, as well as flora and fauna, have been poisoned and greatly altered due to human technology that has crossed all conceivable boundaries. But the earth is still weakly breathing. First snow in 100 years. First Avril15's Snow.
